channel.title: Juha Liikala - Front-End Developer, Pixel Pusher & Globetrotter from Oulu, Finland.
channel.description: Recent content on Juha Liikala - Front-End Developer, Pixel Pusher & Globetrotter from Oulu, Finland.

item.title: Writing
item.description: Writing is something I’ve always enjoyed doing, but seldom in a regular manner. In December 2017, I decided to start building up the habit again by writing something new every week on Medium.com. I haven’t set up a blog here on my personal website yet, but I’m considering it if I manage to keep up with my writing properly in 2018 :) These are my latest on Medium.com: So Interneters, where do you hang out these days (a brief history in blogging)?

item.title: Reading List
item.description: Latest from the book reading list: The Power Of Habit by Charles Duhigg - Amazon.co.uk Machine, Platform, Crowd by Andrew McAfee and Erik Brynjolfsson - Amazon.co.uk The Fourth Industrial Revolution by Klaus Schwab - Amazon.co.uk My World Is My Bond: The Autobiography by Roger Moore - Amazon.co.uk China’s Disruptors: How Alibaba, Xiaomi, Tencent, and Other Companies are Changing the Rules of Business by Edward Tse - Amazon.co.uk Regular reads from the blogosphere: Pat Flynn - Online Business, Passive Income - smartpassiveincome.
